entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
